Description:
Family haven with park views.
This lovingly cared for and meticulously maintained home in a much sought after area in Ringwood North is being reluctantly put on the market by its adoring owners. Just a very short walk to North Ringwood shops, a multitude of primary and secondary schools, public transport and backing onto the picturesque Mahon Reserve which is perfect for the family footy or cricket games, this home has it all. Features included 4 double bedrooms all with built in robes, master with full ensuite that has been updated complete with stone benchtops, new heated towel rack and toilet, formal lounge and dining, centrally located kitchen which has also been updated with Bosch appliances, ample cupboard space and pantry cupboard with fitted shelving to maximise space. The family rumpus room is perfectly placed with its cosy gas log fire with this room flowing directly onto fully covered rear patio where you can sit and entertain, cook on the BBQ while watching the kids playing either in the back yard or in Mahon Reserve which is accessed by the gate in the rear fence. For added comfort there is gas ducted heating and ducted evaporative cooling throughout, plus refrigerated cooling, ceiling fans for circulation, double carport, twin storage areas both under the house and the decking with back up from the garden shed. A brick paved path that goes entirely around the home and forming another outdoor entertaining zone at the foot of the patio. The floor plan of this home shows the formal living and dining areas are separated from the family/casual dining and living but linked by the entry hall and kitchen to form an excellent combined entertaining zone which flows onto the elevated covered back deck and lower brick paved BBQ area. Great for parties. The vendors will be sorry to leave their neighbours with friendships that have formed over many years. This is a wonderful opportunity for someone new to bring up their family in this great family home.

Description:
Serene Suburban Entertainer
Peacefully set amongst trees, at the bowl of a friendly cul de sac that has the conveniences of Wonga Park, Chirnside Park and Croydon North at a touch, this private family entertainer boasts the serenity of the bush, with all the conveniences of suburbia.
Framed by beautifully landscaped gardens, green play spaces and several entertaining areas, the home has been designed for maximum year-round enjoyment and embraces lovely vistas from every room.
Dual living zones supply generous space for everyone to stretch out in comfort; including a large carpeted lounge plus a hardwood floorboard lined family/dining domain that features an open fireplace and sleek black centrepiece kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a wrap-around island breakfast bar.
Four robed bedrooms are serviced by two modern floor-to-ceiling tiled bathrooms. The supersize master suite boasting a walk-in wardrobe, en suite, private courtyard plus direct access into one of the bedrooms that is set up as the ideal nursery.
Outside, the options for entertaining are endless. Showcasing dual covered entertaining decks - one with cafe blinds, a paved alfresco with built-in barbeque station, synthetic and real grass play areas. All benefiting from uninterrupted treed views and direct gate access into scenic bushland and trails.
For those with multiple cars, trades or weekender vehicles, the long gated driveway and double lock-up garage afford plenty of secure parking and there are multiple storage/tool sheds available; including a carpeted one with power that could be used as a studio.
Enriched with quality extras and an exclusive location, it reaches buses, parks and strip shops on foot. A quick, easy commute to Croydon North and Chirnside Park Shopping Centres, primary schools plus premium secondary colleges such as Oxley, Luther and Yarra Valley Grammar.
* Private 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom family entertainer nestled at the bowl of a peaceful cul de sac
* Spacious lounge, family/meals area with open fireplace plus a sleek kitchen with s/steel appliances
* Dual covered decks and paved alfrescos with uninterrupted treetop vistas
* Synthetic and real grass play areas for the children to enjoy
* Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
* 8 channel CCTV system
* Double lock-up garage, gated off-street parking plus several sheds; including one that can be used as a studio
* Direct gate access into scenic bushland and trails behind. Walking distance to parks, buses and strip shops. Minutes by car to premium schools, Croydon North and Chirnside Park Shopping Centres
